reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress chic with a ribbed knit look, well-made with nice fabric, and comfortable, with one noting it accentuates curves gently without being vulgar.

I didn't want it tight/ fitting to my body. Therefore, I ordered the white in sz L and XL. The XL fit nicely around my bun buns, as I like but too large in the arms. The size large fit perfectly but I better not gain 1 pound or it will be too tight in the bun buns area! ðŸ˜³ I'll keep the Large. The pink in the XL, however, fit fine. items.author: C93

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely good product
items.body: This dress is beautiful, it looks elegant, the material looks and feels expensive. It fits well, not too fit not too loose. I went ahead and purchased it again in pink. Read more
items.author: Cecilia Morgan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Purchase
items.body: I had to make a last-minute purchase to attend a funeral. I have gained weight over the past year and was not able to fit the original outfit I planned on wearing. I am very self-conscious about my weight gain and my tummy/waistline. I purchased this dress praying it arrived on time, and the fit would complement my weight/shape! This dress did not disappoint. It was packaged perfectly, the material is nice and heavy, the length is perfect for me (5'9" height). I got so many compliments because it looks expensive and elegant! As a matter of fact, I also ordered a dress from another popular department store that was $500. That dress did not compare to this one and it was returned! Don't second guess yourself.....this is a great purchase for the price Read more
items.author: Alveta

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft material, but runs little bit bigger
items.body: Size M. The dress looks very pretty and fits nicely. The material is soft and comfortable, but I wish it was a little longer. It also runs slightly big â€” the medium felt a bit loose on me. Overall, a great piece for the price. Read more
items.author: Vadikdanch

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO GOOD!!! Buying it in black & green next!!!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Beyond impressed. The pink in person is better than the picture. This dress exceeded expectations. It is thick and comfy but still super chic. The stretch holds up perfectly throughout the day while still being forgiving and flattering. Itâ€™s such a good find. The little sparkle detailing on the buttons add flairâ€¦it looks very high end. Looks like a $200+ brand!!!!! Read more
items.author: MKing

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: I love this dress. The quality is great. It fit true to size. I ordered a large. Iâ€™m 5â€™5 and weigh 177. I also ordered a pink one. Read more
items.author: Tanya Cato

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Cute dress pockets hit in funny and needed to return runs small nice quality fabric, and length. Not too heavy a fabric Read more
items.author: Lynn Scheel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy and pretty
items.body: This dress is classy, versatile and comfortable. The size is perfect it isn't to tight and you have a little give. It is beautiful and feels good on the skin. I love that it comes in different colors so you can change it up depending on what mood you're in. My daughters saw me wearing this dress and they loved it, so I got one for each of them. Read more
items.author: L J

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon V Neck Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon V Neck Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon V Neck Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Navy, White, Beige, Chestnut, Chocolate, Hot Pink, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
